description: The initiative at Hotel Belmar focuses on sustainability and community engagement, transforming the hotel into a high-end eco-friendly destination. Founded by a Costa Rican family, the hotel emphasizes quality over quantity, reducing room numbers while enhancing guest experiences. Their sustainability efforts include a farm-to-table restaurant, organic gardening, and partnerships with local organizations. The hotel aims to connect guests with nature while actively contributing to the community through various educational and conservation initiatives.
name: Hotel Belmar
